Articles.Content: So i tried to make the rocket as depicted in the KSP logo. I have finished it. this is the result. It IS possible to get into orbit with this rocket.
the only problem i had was the mini srb's at the top...they cause the command pod to overhead and explode...
rotate them by about 25 degrees and have it spining while pushing
Hey mods can this be locked, i dont fell like having people telling me that the links are broken...
